title: Ranked rewards after suspension
body: Since I've had a 14 day suspension, I know I wont get ranked rewards this season and that's fine but will I still get the silver border or is that classed as a ranked reward?

replies.body: I was suspended too practically the kast two weeks or rank and with out my first warning or chat restriction. I worked hard to climb from b4 to silver. I dont think its fair to lose out on ranked rewards. I can understand losing honor level but to take away rank rewards is cruel after all the effort and time we put into rank. Only reason i was suspended was due to teammates trolling me in rank and me tilting back a little too hard. Yes i must take responsibility but i dont think skipping to the suspention was fair. I heard riot has suspended a lot of people within the past month and it seems concerning. I acvepted the fast that i kost my honor level and coulnt have my suspention lifted but seeing that i wont get my ranked rewards puts me down a lot knowing i wasted my time playing rank.
Hey there, unfortunately suspended accounts after the set August date won't receive borders or any season rewards.  :(
